analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naabyākataṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam ca na abyākatam na sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naakusalaṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na sa hetukam ca na akusalam na sa hetukam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha pe purejāte āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam ca na abyākatam na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetuko

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na ahetukam ca na abyākatam na ahetukam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naakusalaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na ahetukam ca na akusala

original: naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte dvādasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate dvādasa.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe sahajāte dvādasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate dvādasa
